verses.verse: Then <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7925>rose<s%> <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning;<s%> and he and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5265>set<s%> out from <S%H7851>Shittim<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> and they <S%H3885>lodged<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H2962>before<s%> they <S%H5674>crossed.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about at the <S%H7097>end<s%> of <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> that the <S%H7860>officers<s%> <S%H5674>went<s%> <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp;<s%>

and they <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "When you <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> with the <S%H3881>Levitical<s%> <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H5375>carrying<s%> it, then you shall <S%H5265>set<s%> out from your <S%H4725>place<s%> and <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> it.

<S%H389>"However,<s%> there shall be <S%H996>between<s%> you and it a <S%H7350>distance<s%> of about 2000 <S%H520>cubits<s%> by <S%H4060>measure.<s%> Do not <S%H7126>come<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> it, that you may <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> by <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H1980>go,<s%> for you have not <S%H5674>passed<s%> this <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%><S%H8543>.<s%> <S%H8032><s%>"

Then <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H6942>"Consecrate<s%> yourselves, for <S%H4279>tomorrow<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H6381>wonders<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> you."

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H5375>"Take<s%> up the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> and <S%H5674>cross<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H6440>ahead<s%> of the <S%H5971>people.<s%>" So they <S%H5375>took<s%> up the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H6440>ahead<s%> of the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

Now the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H2088>"This<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> I will <S%H2490>begin<s%> to <S%H1431>exalt<s%> you in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that they may <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H9201>just<s%> as I have <S%H1961>been<s%> with <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> I will be with you.

"You shall, moreover, <S%H6680>command<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> who are <S%H5375>carrying<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'When you <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H7097>edge<s%> of the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> you shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> [still] in the <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>'"

Then <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H5066>"Come<s%> <S%H2008>here,<s%> and <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>"

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "By <S%H2088>this<s%> you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> is <S%H7130>among<s%> you, and that He will <S%H3423>assuredly<s%> <S%H3423>dispossess<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> you the <S%H3669>Canaanite,<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite,<s%> the <S%H2340>Hivite,<s%> the <S%H6522>Perizzite,<s%> the <S%H1622>Girgashite,<s%> the <S%H567>Amorite,<s%> and the <S%H2983>Jebusite.<s%>

<S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> is <S%H5674>crossing<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H6440>ahead<s%> of you into the <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>

<S%H6258>"Now<s%> then, <S%H3947>take<s%> for yourselves <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H376>men<s%> from the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> for <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H259><s%> <S%H7626>tribe.<s%>

"And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> about when the <S%H3709>soles<s%> of the <S%H7272>feet<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> who <S%H5375>carry<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> shall <S%H5117>rest<s%> in the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> shall be <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off,<s%> [and] the <S%H4325>waters<s%> which are <S%H3381>flowing<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H4480>above<s%> <S%H4605><s%> shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5067>heap.<s%>"

So it <S%H1961>came<s%> about when the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5265>set<s%> out from their <S%H168>tents<s%> to <S%H5674>cross<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> with the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H5375>carrying<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%>

and when those who <S%H5375>carried<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> and the <S%H7272>feet<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H5375>carrying<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> were <S%H2881>dipped<s%> in the <S%H7097>edge<s%> of the <S%H4325>water<s%> (for the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H4390>overflows<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H1415>banks<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H7105>harvest<s%>),

that the <S%H4325>waters<s%> which were <S%H3381>flowing<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H4480>above<s%> <S%H4605><s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> [and] <S%H6965>rose<s%> up in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5067>heap,<s%> a <S%H3966>great<s%> <S%H7368>distance<s%> away at <S%H121>Adam,<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> that is <S%H4480>beside<s%> <S%H6654><s%> <S%H6891>Zarethan;<s%> and those which were <S%H3381>flowing<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H5921>toward<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> of the <S%H6160>Arabah,<s%> the <S%H4417>Salt<s%> <S%H3220>Sea,<s%> were <S%H8552>completely<s%> <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off.<s%> So the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5674>crossed<s%> <S%H5048>opposite<s%> <S%H3405>Jericho.<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priests<s%> who <S%H5375>carried<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H5975>firm<s%> on <S%H2724>dry<s%> <S%H2724>ground<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> while <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5674>crossed<s%> on <S%H2724>dry<s%> <S%H2724>ground,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nation<s%> had <S%H8552>finished<s%> <S%H5674>crossing<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>
